https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/a8jcRvQZyCbXLaaYUmBZaI3rbVB.jpg Besieged by cancer and nearing the end, the genius Argentine-Brazilian filmmaker Héctor Babenco (1946-2016) asks Bárbara Paz, his wife, for one last wish: to be the protagonist of his own death. Babenco: Tell Me When I Die
